newsitem.title: USA: AMERICAN SOFTWARE NAMES CFO OF LOGILITY.
newsitem.headline: AMERICAN SOFTWARE NAMES CFO OF LOGILITY.

text.p: American Software said on Tuesday that it had appointed James Modak as senior vice president and chief financial officer of Logility Inc, its value chain management software subsidiary.
Modak previously served as senior vice president of finance at Total Systems Services Inc, and at First Financial Management Corp, American Software said.
The company also said it had filed an initial public offering of about 16 percent of the common stock of Logility, or 2.2 million shares.
Underwriters for the offering, Montgomery Securities and Cowen & Co, were granted an option to buy up to 330,000 additional shares to cover over-allotments.
In a statement, the company said proceeds from the offering would fund expansions in research, development, marketing and possible acquisitions.
American Software develops supply chain management and manufacturing systems.
